import React, {useState} from "react"; import styles from './details-ingredient.module.css' import {data} from "../../../../utils/data"; const DetailsIngredient = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); return ( <>

  • {data.name}

    • Калории, ккал

      {data.calories}

    • Белки, г

      {data.proteins}

    • Жиры, г

      {data.fat}

    • Углеводы, г

      {data.carbohydrates}
    • ) } export default DetailsIngredient;
